title.rendered: UAE vs Namibia, CWC League 2019-23: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

UAE: Muhammad Waseem, Chirag Suri, Rohan Mustafa, Vriitya Aravind (wk), Chundangapoyil Rizwan(C), Aryan Lakra, Alishan Sharafu, Karthik Palaniapan Meiyappan, Junaid Siddique, Zahoor Khan, Hazrat Bilal

Namibia: Lohandre Louwrens, Shaun Fouche, Gerhard Erasmus (c), Jan Nicol Loftie-Eaton, Zane Green (wk), Michael van Lingen, Bernard Scholtz, Jan Frylinck, Ruben Trumpelmann, Tangeni Lungameni, Ben Shikongo

Pitch Report

Venue: Dubai International Cricket Stadium, Dubai

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 263

2nd innings average score: 194

Wickets per innings: 8

Type: Good for bowling

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Jan Frylinck fancies facing the UAE. He has bludgeoned 132 runs at 44 and scalped three wickets in four matches.

Vriitya Aravind’s career-best 115* came against Namibia. In the league, he has hammered the most runs (804 at 36) and pouched the most catches (22) for the UAE.

Junaid Siddique has six wickets at 25.6 in four matches against Namibia.

Gerhard Erasmus has the second-most runs (1,070 at 51) in ODIs since 2022, only after Shubman Gill.

Ruben Trumpelmann and Tangeni Lungameni are in superb form. They have picked up 41 wickets between them in the last 10 matches.

Michael van Lingen has scored two centuries in the last four ODIs. With 637 runs at 37, he is the second-highest run-scorer for Namibia in the league.

Rohan Mustafa, Muhammad Waseem, Zane Green, and Lohandre Louwrens have forced their way into the Best11 in three of the last five matches.

In the last three matches at the venue, 62% of the wickets have been taken by the pacers.
